articles.author: Guy Faulconbridge, Lidia Kelly
articles.title: Russia formally withdraws from key post-Cold War European armed forces treaty - Reuters
articles.description: Russia on Tuesday formally withdrew from a landmark security treaty which limited key categories of conventional armed forces, blaming the United States for undermining post-Cold War security with the enlargement of the NATO military alliance.
articles.content: MOSCOW, Nov 7 (Reuters) - Russia on Tuesday formally withdrew from a landmark security treaty which limited key categories of conventional armed forces, blaming the United States for undermining post… [+3567 chars]
